ProductData.question: What benefits can I get from digibank application?
ProductData.answer: There are many benefits that you can get by using digibank application. You can check your balance, set your own budgets , fund transfers, bill payments, top-up mobile phones, and access our Virtual Assistant services.

ProductData.question: Is the Virtual Assistant a real person?
ProductData.answer: Virtual Assistant is an artificial intelligence than can understand and also answer your question.

ProductData.question: Do I have to become customer of DBS to register myself for digibank service?
ProductData.answer: Digibank service is currently only available to customers who already have DBS ATM Card or DBS Debit Card. For those who do not have a DBS ATM Card or DBS Debit Card , please contact your Relationship Manager or visit nearest branch to obtain your new DBS Debit Card.

ProductData.question: As a digibank customer, will I be served at DBS branches?
ProductData.answer: You will be able to perform daily banking transactions through the digibank application and also receive banking services at DBS branch offices.

ProductData.question: How do I register for the digibank application?
ProductData.answer:
For DBS clients, registration can be done through:

  1. DBS Branch: Users will be guided by our Bank Officers to download and install the digibank application. Once installed, user will then be guided to complete the registration process and to fulfill all the terms and conditions as stated by the Bank.
  2. b. Cellular Phones: Users must download and install the application. Once installed, user will have to complete the registration by following the instructions provided by the application.

ProductData.question: What are the devices or gadgets that can be used to access digibank application?
ProductData.answer: Currently, you can only use Android or iOS smartphone (iPhone) to access digibank services. All of our banking services will be accessible through your phone.

ProductData.question: What are the transactions that I can perform through digibank?
ProductData.answer: You can perform debit transactions, including e-commerce payments; transfer funds to a savings account or mobile phone; bill payments to PLN, PAM, post-paid phone, TV subscription, Internet, and purchase prepaid balance.

ProductData.question: Will I be able to use digibank application abroad?
ProductData.answer: As long as you have an active Internet connection, you can use digibank application in any country.

ProductData.question: What is the cost of using digibank application?
ProductData.answer: The fees for using digibank application is the cost of your data (3G/GPRS/ WIFI), that is depending on the data service you are using, as well as the transaction fees corresponding to the cost of services of your provider. All transaction fees can be found here

ProductData.question: Will I be provided with a savings book for my digibank account?
ProductData.answer: digibank account does not provide savings book or checkbook. digibank is a paperless banking!

ProductData.question: Is digibank safe?
ProductData.answer: digibank is a product of DBS Bank, which bears the title of "Asia's Best Bank" by The Banker, a member of the Financial Times, and "Best Bank in Asia-Pacific" by Global Finance. We are recognized as "Safest Bank in Asia" by Global Finance for seven consecutive years from 2009 to 2015. In addition, we actively monitor and control the risks of fraud activities and also frequently updates our security system.

ProductData.question: What types of security measures applied in digibank application?
ProductData.answer: For security reasons, our digibank application uses 2 (two) authentication factors. In addition to that, we also constantly monitor the risks of fraud activities and ensure that our security system is up to standard.

ProductData.question: What can I do to protect my personal information while performing banking activities from my phone?
ProductData.answer: To protect your personal information while performing banking activies, ensure that you protect the confidentiality of your personal information, including login details and passwords, install applications only from trusted sources and also always connect to a secure internet network.

ProductData.question: I have more than one phone number. Will I be able to register all of my mobile numbers?
ProductData.answer: For security purposes, you can only register one account per KTP, NPWP, and mobile number.

ProductData.question: Can I change my phone number and still use digibank application?
ProductData.answer: You can still use digibank application even if you changed your mobile number. Check your profile page and update your mobile number, so that you can still receive OTP (One-Time Password) and notifications.

ProductData.question: What will happen if I change my mobile number?
ProductData.answer: You can update your phone number by clicking on "Profile" in the menu and edit it there. Other columns that can be edited is your email address and your profile picture.

ProductData.question: Can I change my device and still use digibank application?
ProductData.answer: You can stil use digibank as long as you switch to a supported device.You just need to download digibank app to the new device. Your username and password will remain the same.

ProductData.question: What should I do if I forget my username?
ProductData.answer: You can retrieve your username through the "forget username" link in the login page.

ProductData.question: How do I change my password?
ProductData.answer: Change your password by clicking on "Profile" in the application menu.

ProductData.question: What should I do if I lost my debit card?
ProductData.answer: You can temporarily block your debit card if it is misplaced or permanently block your debit card if you lost it. Temporary block can go up to 60 days, in which after that period your card will be permanently blocked. Block your debit card through 'Lihat Detail Kartu' in the menu.
